document.masterDocTitle: A revision of Chinese species of Mesopolobus Westwood (Hymenoptera: Pteromalidae) with descriptions of four new species from China

paragraph.heading:
Mesopolobus minutus Dzhanokmen, 1982
New record to China
( Fig. 14 )

Distribution. China ( Inner Mongolia , Beijing , Hebei , Shaanxi , Ningxia , Sichuan , Guizhou , Tibet ); Palearctic Region ( Noyes, 2014 ).
